epidemic.progpracticum.view

Class SouthPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • epidemic.progpracticum.view.SouthPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SouthPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The SouthPanel class is apart of the SimulationFrame and holds buttons to control the timer.
    Version:
    Autumn 2013
    Author:
    Aaron Schraufnagel
    See Also:
    BorderLayout, Dimension, java.awt.ActionEvent, java.awt.ActionListener, JButton, Timer, Serialized Form

      • SouthPanel

        public SouthPanel(WorldPanel aWorldPanel,
          EastPanel anEastPanel,
          javax.swing.Timer aTimer)
        Parameterized constructor for the SouthPanel that constructs the buttons and displays the components.
        Parameters:
        aWorldPanel - represents a world panel containing the graphical representation of SimWorld
        anEastPanel - panel that holds statistics
        aTimer - controls the SimWorld's start and stop intervals
        Postcondition:“
        the southpanel is constructed
